product_name: Big Agnes Buffalo Park Sleeping Bag
long_description: From Big Agnes, the Buffalo Park sleeping bag is perfect big guys or for car campers that want more room. Underside insulation has been eliminated and replaced with a sleeve for a 25 in. wide Big Agnes sleeping pad, sold separately. Quallofil(TM) synthetic insulation works a lot like down, with minimal bulkiness and excellent packability; it provides warmth even when wet. Ripstop nylon shell with has a Durable Water Repellent finish; cotton/polyester lining is soft against the skin and has a stain-resistant finish. Built-in pillow pocket can be stuffed with clothes or a travel pillow. Rectangular shape offers extra room in footbox and shoulders. Features a 2-way, full-length, locking zipper with a big, easy-to-grab zipper pull. Fabric stiffeners on both sides of the zipper prevent annoying snags. Interior fabric loops stabilize a sleeping bag liner, sold separately. Big Agnes Buffalo Park includes a nylon stuff sack.
short_description: From Big Agnes, the Buffalo Park sleeping bag is perfect big guys or for car campers that want more room.
